contract.name: AbstractGameContract
contract.desc:
Abstract contract for managing multiplayer games on Algorand.
Provides the basic logic for creating, joining, committing/revealing moves,
managing fees, and deleting games.

This class is intended to be extended by concrete contracts that implement
the specific game logic. It should not be deployed directly.

Subclasses should add specific game methods and logic,
and decorate the concrete class with the

methods.name: joinGame

args.name: gameId
args.desc: The ID of the game to join

args.name: payment
args.desc: Payment transaction for joining the game

methods.desc: Join a game by paying an entry fee

methods.name: getRequiredMbr
methods.desc: Public method to get the required MBR to create a game

methods.name: commit
methods.desc: Registers a player's commit (hash of move + salt)

methods.name: reveal

args.name: salt
args.desc: The salt used in the commit

methods.desc: Allows a player to reveal their move.

methods.name: backOff

args.name: gameId
args.desc: The ID of the game to withdraw from.

methods.desc: Allows a player to withdraw from a game before it starts.

methods.name: verifyDeadline

args.name: gameId
args.desc: The ID of the game to check.

methods.desc:
Verifies the game state against the deadline and resolves the game if the deadline has passed.
This function handles timeouts for both commit and reveal phases.

methods.name: deleteGame

args.name: gameId
args.desc: The ID of the game to delete

methods.desc:
Deletes a game and refunds all players
Only the creator (player[0]) can delete the game
